about.top-text: I am a self-taught web developer and programmer and a guy slighty obsessed with code quality.
about.bottom-text: I build new projects and love to get more project ideas from others. I am a fast learner and a good problem solver. While I am still a college student, I still like to learn more about programming and love to build new projects.

projects.name: Book-Lister
projects.description: Search, find, and add books to your list. A reading list web-app developed using React js and the Google Books API.

projects.name: Searchia
projects.description: A search engine clone built with React js that takes a query and returns search results. Created with the help of Google Search API.

projects.name: Promethewz
projects.description: Desktop Screen recorder application developed using ElectronJS (JavaScript framework). Built installer for Windows OS users.

projects.name: Shortly
projects.description: A URL shortener website built with React js and SHRTCODE API. Instantly provides 3 shortened URL(s) for your link.
